channel.title: Hugo on Jeremy Hemberger
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Jeremy Hemberger

item.title: Building a website using Github pages and Hugo
item.description: If your situation is at all similar to mine right now, the COVID pandemic has greatly impacted day-to-day research operations and probably has had an impact on your productivity. Many of the tasks I queued up are now pushed way back, and there is a void of time that needs filling - preferably with something other than Netflix and binge-snacking… So, why not build a website for yourself (or a project you are working on)!
